# textDidEndEditingNotification

**Type Property**

Sent when a control with editable cells ends an editing session.

## Declaration

```swift
class let textDidEndEditingNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

The field editor of the edited cell originally sends an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl/textDidEndEditingNotification] to the control, which passes it on in this form to its delegate. The notification object is the `NSControl` object posting the notification. The `userInfo` dictionary contains the following information:



See the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/objectivec/nsobject/1428847-controltextdidendediting] method for details. The system posts this notification on the main actor.

## Control-Editing Notifications

- **textDidBeginEditingNotification**: Sent when a control with editable cells begins an edit session.
- **textDidChangeNotification**: Sent when the text in the receiving control changes.
